meanings.sent1: The imported goods were tariffed, making them more expensive for consumers.
meanings.sent2: The tariffed products from overseas were not as popular due to their higher prices.
meanings.sent3: The tariffed items felt like they were wearing a heavy tax coat.
meanings.sent4: The small business struggled under the weight of the tariffed fees.
meanings.sent5: The tariffed goods stood out on the shelves with their increased prices.

meanings.sent1: The tariffed products faced increased costs at the border.
meanings.sent2: The tariffed goods had additional charges added to their price tags.
meanings.sent3: The tariffed items seemed to be playing a game of financial tag.
meanings.sent4: The company felt like it was carrying a heavy load of tariffed expenses.
meanings.sent5: The tariffed items were like guests at a party who had to pay an entrance fee.
